name: Cotyledon
description:
A game made for Gdevelop Game Jam

Controls

WASD  - For moving

Left Click- To Shoot (Make sure to aim)

Escape/Q - Pause

Stay still - Interact/Collect

Guide

To feed your companion go to one of the berry or super berry

Don't forget to feed your companion or he'll die

To refill your ammunition (Leaf) go to a nearby bush

Playable on Liluo io

Cotyledon | Liluo io Edition
